message: <PORTRAIT:0, 27, 0>Good afternoon.<NL>Did you come by to see Dr. Aki again?<NB><PORTRAIT:1, 0, 4>Yup!<NB><PORTRAIT:0, 27, 0>Well, then you should go check his<NL>office all the way in the back.<NB><PORTRAIT:1, 0, 1>Okay, thanks a lot!<NB><PORTRAIT:0, 27, 0>By the way, thanks for playing<NL>the randomizer.<NB>We've worked very hard on it.<NL>For any suggestions join the discord.<NB><PORTRAIT:0, 27, 1>Have fun!<END:0>
